Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to use of personal information received from veterans or family members of veterans receiving services from the state
Summary: Relates to use of personal confidential information received from veterans or family members of veterans receiving services from the state and political subdivisions thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to personal information obtained from veterans or family members of veterans receiving services from the state and political subdivisions thereof
